long_description: The Gregory Tempo 3 hydration pack offers a close, comfortable fit perfect for trail-running excursions. Carry your hydration and a few small essentials comfortably in this pack. Fluid Mechanics design means the shape of the pack allows you to carry essentials while maintaining your natural stride and arm swing while running. Mesh-backed shoulder straps breathe well for continued comfort; sternum strap helps keep shoulder straps in place. Hydrapak(R) 2 liter (64 fl. oz.) hydration reservoir features internal baffles to reduce sloshing movement. ZIppered main compartment is perfect for stashing running or trail essentials; internal silicone security pocket is waterproof. The Gregory Tempo 3 hydration pack also features a trekking pole storage pocket, stretch-mesh external pocket, accessory pockets and a gel flask holder (flask not included). Side compression straps secure contents. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light.
short_description: The Gregory Tempo 3 hydration pack offers a close, comfortable fit perfect for trail-running excursions. Carry your hydration and a few small essentials comfortably in this pack.
